author: getgenieai

sections.description:
Trying to simplify your image creation journey? The Genie Image is a powerful text-to-image WordPress plugin developed using OpenAI DALL-E 2. This AI image generator plugin enables you to easily write a text prompt and then turn it into a unique and perfect match image with just one click. It doesnâ€™t even need a third-party integration.

Get Free Images!

Generate images with absolutely no additional cost or subscription. You don’t need to sign up for any additional creative services or hire any designers anymore. And, you are free from the hassle of meeting and discussing with them. The Genie Image plugin produces real artwork with no copyright issues.

Higher Resolution Images

The Genie Image plugin maintains high-resolution images that contain deep-level details. DALL-E 2 gives this plugin the ability to draw realistic people and objects into images to bring them to life. And, the right combination between objects and environment makes the images very vivid.

Integrated With The WordPress Media Library

Using other image creation tools requires you to download images to your device and manually upload them to the media library. This process wastes some extra time of yours. However, the Genie Image plugin allows you to create images directly in your WordPress media library. So, you can easily use them anywhere on your website.

Key Features of Genie Image Plugin

âœ”ï¸No need to spend hefty sums of money to create your website image.

âœ”ï¸Powered by state-of-the-art technology OpenAI DALL-E 2.

âœ”ï¸100% Royalty-free and unique images.

âœ”ï¸Generate and insert images directly to the WordPress media library.

âœ”ï¸Create high-resolution images in no time.

âœ”ï¸Great balance between shadow and lighting in images.

âœ”ï¸Has a deep understanding of the relationship between context and objects of an image.

âœ”ï¸Use an improved (CLIP) neural model for linking text and visual information.

âœ”ï¸No need to use stock photo services like Shutterstock or Freepik.

âœ”ï¸Complete tasks without collaborating with graphic designers.

âœ”ï¸Compatible with any WordPress theme and builders.

== Installation ==

If you love all these features, letâ€™s know how to get started with the Genie Image Generator plugin.

Step 1: Activate the license key.

Step 2: From the WordPress dashboard, click Media

Step 3: Locate the â€œGenie Image AIâ€ button at the top.

Step 4: Clicking on it will reveal the media settings popup.

Step 5: Put your prompt in the â€œContext / Keywordâ€ box from the â€œGenie Imageâ€ tab.

Step 6: Hit the â€œGenerateâ€ button and within seconds you will see the image.

Step 7: Select the generated image, you will see a â€œ+â€ icon at the top right.

Step 8: Click it to save the image to the media library.

== Screenshots ==

Frequently Asked Questions

What is an Ai image generator plugin?

An Ai image generator plugin is powered by artificial intelligence to create an image based on your given text input.

What does Genie Image generator plugin do?

The Genie Image plugin harnesses the power of OpenAI DALL-E 2 to generate images directly in your WordPress media library.

Is the Genie Image generator plugin free?

Yes, the Genie Image generator plugin is 100% free for everyone.

What kind of expertise does one need to use Genie Image plugin?

You donâ€™t need to have any design or technical knowledge other than WordPress-related knowledge.

What is DALL-E 2?

DALL-E 2 is a piece of software for creating realistic and intuitive images in a given descriptive text.

What are Ai-created images in WordPress?

Ai Generated Images in WordPress means using images generated by the Ai plugin on your website.

Is there any royalty or copyright issue in using the Genie Image plugin?

The Genie Image plugin can produce unique images that are free from any royalty or copyright issues.
